quests.name: The Shy Little Robot
objectives: Explore WALL-E Realm.
Search the Realm to find a way to repair WALL-E.
You found WALL-E's Track! Go bring it to him.
Gather 60 Trash by removing Trash Piles.
Use the Crafting Station to craft 6 Trash Cubes.
Bring the Trash Cubes to WALL-E.
Plant 8 WALL-E's Special Seeds and help them grow in the Realm.
Beautiful. Go see what WALL-E thinks.
Ask Merlin for help with WALL-E.
Talk to Scrooge McDuck.
Mine for 2 Garnet around the Village.
Bring the Garnets to Scrooge.

Talk to:
  ‧ Mickey.
  ‧ Goofy.

Gather these items:
  ‧ Collect the Ball inside Mickey's House.
  ‧ Fish the Sprout Boot from one of the Meadow's ponds.

Make sure you have the following items in your Inventory...
  ‧ Fire Extinguisher
  ‧ Ball
  ‧ Sprout Boot
You found everything! Bring the items to WALL-E.
Make sure WALL-E is comfortable in the Village by placing his House.
Use the Scrooge McDuck sign to pay for the construction of WALL-E's House.
Everything is ready for WALL-E. Welcome him to the Village.
Beautiful. Go see what WALL-E thinks.
